title: What are some best line written by you? - Poems, Shayaris n Quotes. - Quora

response.answer_text: Cherish the friends who can say no to you because you can only say it to those who are very distant or very close to you.Independence is not about trying to walk alone; it's about being able to walk alone.Don’t get invested in your smiles so much that you forget to wipe the tears of those around you.Can think of only these three currently

Don't trust everyone and lose your value. Trust the ones who believe in your values.  If you haven't set any goals, then it doesn't matter what path you take. Set your goals, aim for it and work your ass off. The rest will fall in place.  Success never comes without struggle...

Usually I write poetry in my mother tongue Telugu regularly. Ofcourse occasionally when my mind ask to write on a challenge topic.,I try in English also. This year behalf of September 5th teachers day I submitted my ppt to my HOD to add for online webinar as my contribution. Here I'm adding It . please add comment if you like.A teacher paint our mind A teacher guide our thought A teacher helps to reach our goal A teacher light the path to lead the youth…. A teacher is glitter with perfection A teacher needs our attention A teacher pour affection A teacher glisten and spark A teacher advice their faults A teacher share their achievements A teacher is ray of traveling headlong In History teachers are heroes of unsung A poet… ..A scientist… A leader…A great ruler.. For ever in history.. Character begins with a teacher Erasor of all problems so clear is can also be by a teacher
